title: How is St. Xavier's College, Ranchi? - Quora

response.answer_text: St. Xavier's College, Ranchi is one of the best colleges in Jharkhand and Bihar as well. Students come from far away places to study here. St. Xavier's College offers more than 50 courses and most of the courses have very good faculties. I have studied M.A. English from St. Xavier's College, Ranchi and the English department of St. Xavier's College is known as the best in the colleges of Jharkhand, Bihar, and UP. Moreover, the infrastructure of the college is also really good. They have common as well as departmental libraries, they have 3–4 canteens, one of the canteens also has gaming zone where you can play indoor games in your free time. The college also has gymnasium, basketball ground, and a big ground where different sports are played. Also, it provides hostel for boys. Joining St. Xavier's College will be your best decision. And yes, their admission process as well as other official works are hassle-free. Visit their site http://www.sxcran.org.in to know the last date of filling up the admission form to various courses and other details as well. Enroll yourself now.

It is quite good. Accredited by NAAC. One of the best colleges in Ranchi, in fact the best college in Ranchi. In other colleges you can afford to bunk your classes and still manage to give the semester exams but that is not the case with the St. Xavier's College , Ranchi. One of my classmates wasn't allowed to appear in the semester exam just because he had less than 75% attendance. This college doesn't compromise with it's rules. Professors are well qualified and hardly do they miss their lectures. I was a commerce student and relied totally on college notes for the exams. Co curricular activities keep taking place every now and then. Cricket series, football games, basketball all these take place every year. But the main attraction is the college fest which takes place for three days every year. I studied there for 5 years and those were the best days of my life. You can look for better options if you have the marks and if you can afford in other cities but St. Xavier's College, Ranchi is great as well.
